channel.title: Logout Timer Delta

item.title: Logout Timer Delta
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

How do i add a logout timer in delta to prevent xlogging while pking

My logout button case

case 9154: // Log out long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inCombat) { c.sM("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!"); break; }

Read full topic
